properties.name: Chen Xiaodao
properties.personality: Seems timid but actually has amazing powers of observation

relationships.name: Su Mingyue
relationships.type: Gratitude (Chen Xiaodao secretly protects Su Mingyue)

relationships.name: Lin Xiu
relationships.type: Fear and respect (Chen Xiaodao has seen Lin Xiu cheat and kill)

events.details: Chen Xiaodao notices his digital watch and crew communicator malfunctioning simultaneously, along with flickering lights throughout the crew quarters
consequences: Makes note of the timing and pattern

events.details: While conducting his nightly rounds, Chen spots Su Mingyue and Lin Xiu entering normally restricted areas separately, both appearing suspicious
consequences: Notices the electronic malfunctions coincide with their presence

events.details: Chen uses the service elevator's blind spots to observe Lin Xiu tampering with electronic panels, causing brief power surges
consequences: Confirms Lin Xiu's involvement in the malfunctions
Strengthens his desire to protect Su Mingyue

events.details: Chen finds a hand-drawn map of the ship's electrical systems in Su Mingyue's locker, showing planned interference points matching the malfunctions

Following power fluctuations, Chen discovers both Su Mingyue and Lin Xiu in the lower deck storage area, surrounded by strange electronic equipment that appears decades more advanced than the ship's technology
consequences: Reveals the malfunctions are intentional and connected to the ship's disappearance
Chen must choose between reporting them or investigating further
